# `polars shape` for [dataframe](/commands/categories/dataframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>Shows column and row size for a dataframe.</div>

## Signature

```> polars shape {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Shows row and column shape
```nu
> [[a b]; [1 2] [3 4]] | polars into-df | polars shape
╭───┬──────┬─────────╮
│ # │ rows │ columns │
├───┼──────┼─────────┤
│ 0 │    2 │       2 │
╰───┴──────┴─────────╯

```
